data.name: XSessionManagerClient
desc: Connect to a session manager to get information about pending desktop shutdown.

methods.name: addSessionManagerListener
desc: addSessionManagerListener registers a listener for session management events

methods.name: cancelShutdown
desc: Call cancelShutdown to try to cancel a desktop shutdown in progress.

methods.name: interactionDone
desc: interactionDone is called when a listener has finished user interaction

methods.name: queryInteraction
desc: queryInteraction issues a request for a user interaction slot from the session manager

methods.name: removeSessionManagerListener
desc: removeSessionManagerListener deregisters a listener for session events

methods.name: saveDone
desc: saveDone signals that a listener has processed a save request
